JobFullDesc: ABOUT THE ROLEWe are building an exciting new team to grow our Uber Direct business in the US & Canada, and we need people like you to help us bring this team to life! Uber Direct enables merchants to unlock last mile delivery for their customers via their app or website. Our Senior Operations Manager, Uber Direct will drive the development of critical insights, craft strategies, and scale impactful initiatives to build the Uber Direct business. This role will lead all efforts to improve reliability of Direct business and work closely with cross-functional counterparts to lead high impact initiatives while offering ownership and autonomy over your work.WHAT YOU'LL DOData analysis: design, execute and automate processes to run and optimize the business performance and reliability. You will autonomously build your own analyses and dashboards to measure your projects' successExperiment: perform analysis and experiments to find ways to reduce costs and improve profitability of the Uber Direct businessProcess management: Work closely with CommOps teams to manage, create new processes that enables us to unlock new partnerships and also provide best-in-class merchant experience.Stakeholder management: an important cross-functional partner to teams working with Uber Direct (CommOps, Product, Legal, etc.)Coordinate with the Product team to prioritize and iterate on new tech features that improve the merchant experienceBASIC QUALIFICATIONS4+ years of professional work experience in a related field (consulting, operations, strategy, analytics, tech, investment banking)Strong Excel/Google Sheets or SQL proficiencyBachelors degreePREFERRED QUALIFICATIONSExperience in leading process and performance improvements by leveraging data and insightsExperience working cross functionally with Product and Operation teamsExperiment and hustle to build quickly. This individual will need to identify and evaluate solutions for short and long-term operational problemsExperience working closely and communicating effectively with a diverse set of stakeholders in a constantly evolving, rapid growth environment with tight deadlines
